work_experience.title: Product Engineer & Web Developer
work_experience.description: Transformed the prototyping process for a venture studio, developed a waste management app MVP reviewed by 3 major companies, and led the development of a fintech solution providing credit access to 400+ app-based drivers by migrating from Webflow to Nuxt and implementing a scoring system.

work_experience.title: Web Developer
work_experience.description: Developed solutions for 4 projects, created a comprehensive UI for a U.S.-based client, defined API schemas, and led a team of 5 developers to ensure WCAG 2.0 compliance for a website with 100+ pages while optimizing an admin e-commerce site.

work_experience.title: Web Developer
work_experience.description: Managed the development and support for over 1,000 clients, developing WordPress themes and streamlining theme deployment, reducing production time by 66%. Implemented Scrum Agile, reducing resolution time from 6 days to 1 day, and automated change log communication.

work_experience.title: Network Operation Center Technician & Database Administrator
work_experience.description: Monitored infrastructure applications, servers, and databases, improving operational processes for the NOC and working with ticketing and monitoring systems. Completed courses in SQL Server, DB2, Linux, and Windows Server.

work_experience.title: Recruitment & Operations Intern
work_experience.description: Accomplished weekly recruiting goals, conducted phone screens and interviews, and implemented a software that enhanced phone screen efficiency, reducing time per call.

volunteering.title: Vice-Curator, Funding Officer & Shaper
volunteering.description: Empowered individuals through guidance on project execution, managing logistics such as fundraising, recruiting, and fostering internal culture. Built a website for external communication and represented the organization at international events. Co-managed the 'Mi Futuro' project, providing vocational guidance to over 400 students in underrepresented communities through mentorship connections, personality and vocational tests, and scholarship information, while overseeing fundraising and scheduling logistics.

volunteering.title: Organizer
volunteering.description: Promoted inclusivity in tech for a community of 900+ members through events like 'DevFest,' which attracted over 200 attendees. Managed event organization, fundraising, and strategic alliances while producing audiovisual content for social media and collaborating with 'Women Techmakers' to support female participation in technology.
